name: Headdress Winged Horse Pattern Scarf
description: Premium silk scarf featuring the Headdress Winged Horse pattern

pattern_details.name: Headdress Winged Horse Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Auspicious for the Year of the Horse, soaring high
pattern_details.description: Traditional pattern combining horse and wing elements, symbolizing speed and strength
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes auspiciousness for the Year of the Horse

name: Deer and Floral Pattern Scarf
description: Light purple base with white deer and floral pattern. The design features curved plant motifs and abstract lines, presenting a soft decorative style with gentle color tones, perfect for daily gentle outfits.

pattern_details.name: Deer and Floral Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Deer symbolizes auspiciousness and longevity, combined with flowers implying vitality and beauty
pattern_details.description: A soft pattern design combining deer and floral elements with smooth curved lines and gentle color tones, presenting a low-saturation gentle style
pattern_details.origin: Innovative design of traditional Chinese auspicious patterns
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes auspiciousness, vitality and good wishes, suitable for gentle and fresh daily wear

name: Cloud-style Ruyi Pattern Scarf
description: Luxury silk scarf featuring the Cloud-style Ruyi pattern symbolizing auspicious wishes and good fortune

pattern_details.name: Cloud-style Ruyi Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Clouds symbolize auspiciousness and Ruyi symbolizes wishes coming true
pattern_details.description: A traditional Chinese pattern combining cloud motifs with Ruyi shapes, representing good fortune and wishes being fulfilled
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes auspicious clouds and the fulfillment of wishes

name: Hui Pattern Wall Art
description: Elegant canvas art featuring the traditional Hui pattern symbolizing continuity and eternity

pattern_details.name: Hui Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Symbolizes continuity, eternity, and unbroken cycles
pattern_details.description: One of the oldest Chinese geometric patterns consisting of squared spirals, representing endless continuity
pattern_details.significance: Represents the concept of infinity and eternal continuity

name: Lingzhi-style Ruyi Pattern Cushion Cover
description: Premium cotton cushion cover with Lingzhi-style Ruyi pattern symbolizing longevity and good fortune

pattern_details.name: Lingzhi-style Ruyi Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Lingzhi mushroom symbolizes longevity and immortality, combined with Ruyi for good fortune
pattern_details.description: A pattern combining the auspicious Lingzhi mushroom (symbol of longevity) with Ruyi shapes (symbol of wishes fulfilled)
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes longevity, immortality, and good fortune

name: Intertwined Branch Pattern Table Runner
description: Elegant linen table runner with traditional Intertwined Branch pattern symbolizing growth and continuity

pattern_details.name: Intertwined Branch Pattern
pattern_details.meaning: Symbolizes continuous growth, longevity, and interconnectedness
pattern_details.description: A classic Chinese pattern featuring vines or branches intertwining with leaves and flowers, representing eternal life and growth
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes the continuous cycle of life and interconnectedness

name: Diamond Grid Pattern Coaster Set
description: Set of 6 ceramic coasters with Diamond Grid pattern, combining traditional design with modern functionality

pattern_details.name: Diamond Grid Pattern
pattern_details.description: A traditional geometric pattern consisting of interconnected diamond shapes forming a protective grid
pattern_details.significance: Symbolizes stability, protection, and cosmic order
